object.name: ForumTopic
object.description: This object represents a forum topic.
object.rst_description: This object represents a forum topic.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the forum topic
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the forum topic
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format
annotations.html_description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format
annotations.rst_description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format
annotations.name: icon_color

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon
annotations.name: icon_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: True, if the name of the topic wasn't specified explicitly by its creator and likely needs to be changed by the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the name of the topic wasn't specified explicitly by its creator and likely needs to be changed by the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the name of the topic wasn't specified explicitly by its creator and likely needs to be changed by the bot
annotations.name: is_name_implicit
